title: Image Generation
description: Generate, edit, and create variations of images using AI image generation APIs (DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, etc.)
author: Jarvis Inc
curl_example: curl https://api.openai.com/v1/images/generations -H 'Authorization: Bearer $OPENAI_API_KEY' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"model":"dall-e-3","prompt":"a white siamese cat","n":1,"size":"1024x1024"}'

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate an image from a text prompt. Returns a URL or base64 image data.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Detailed text description of the image to generate. Be specific about style, composition, lighting, and subject.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Number of images to generate (1 for DALL-E 3, 1-10 for DALL-E 2)

returns.description: Generated image object with url (temporary URL valid ~1 hour), revised_prompt (DALL-E 3 may refine your prompt), and b64_json (if requested)

commands.name: edit
commands.description: Edit an existing image by providing a mask and prompt describing the desired changes. Requires DALL-E 2.

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL or base64 of the source image to edit (must be square PNG, max 4MB)

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Text description of the desired edit or change

parameters.name: mask_url
parameters.description: URL or base64 of the mask image (transparent areas indicate where to edit)

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Number of edited images to generate (1-10)

returns.description: Edited image object with url and metadata

commands.name: variation
commands.description: Create variations of an existing image. Generates similar but distinct versions. Requires DALL-E 2.

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL or base64 of the source image (must be square PNG, max 4MB)

returns.description: Variation image object with url and metadata
